scripts.lerna:bootstrap: yarn build:common && yarn build:wallet && yarn build:react-wallet && npx lerna bootstrap --contents dist
scripts.build:common: cd packages/common && yarn && yarn build && cd dist && yarn link
scripts.build:wallet: cd packages/wallet && yarn link @sovryn/common && yarn && yarn build && cd dist && yarn link
scripts.build:react-wallet: yarn prepare-example && cd packages/react-wallet && yarn && yarn link @blueprintjs/core && yarn build
scripts.prepare-example: cd packages/react-wallet/example && yarn && cd node_modules/@blueprintjs/core && yarn link
